website_summaries.verdict: For dogs and cats, this natural supplement helps anxiety as well as joint and muscle pain and depression.
pros: This supplement offers multiple health benefits
Can be easily added to pet's food
cons: Product receives rave reviews, but buyers should note this is not a full-spectrum hemp extract

website_summaries.verdict: This product can reduce pain for your cat and has the added benefit of relieving anxiety.
pros: A natural supplement to support pain relief
Does not have long-term side effects
Helps with arthritis pain in cat's hips and joints
As "as needed" product rather than a supplement you have to give at all times
cons: While this oil includes CBD, it is not as powerful as a product marketed for CBD oil exclusively

customer_reviews.title: Helped my kitty with arthritis!!
customer_reviews.text: This product has really helped my 11 year old kitty with his arthritis. He used to pretty much just stay upstairs and was moody, cause he didnt feel very good. But now hes acting like a young kitty again! I am recommending this to everyone I know who has pets!
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: Helps my cats anxiety
customer_reviews.text: My cat is 18 years old and has recently started suffering from separation anxiety. The Hemp oil given to her morning and evening helps a lot. I would definitely recommend hemp oil if your pet is having any kind of anxiety.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Norton

customer_reviews.title: Results in days!
customer_reviews.text: We are giving this supplement to our 105lb, 9yo, yellow lab, David. He used to whine in pain when getting up from bed each morning. After just a few days of using Full Spectrum CBD Oil, David quit making that heart wrenching sound. It’s been about a month since we started using this supplement and we are excited to see what other health improvements we see in our sweet old David!
customer_reviews.author: Josh-n-Angie

customer_reviews.title: Anxious Dog Storm Relief
customer_reviews.text: My dog is a rescue and has extreme anxiety. During thunderstorms, he shakes uncontrollably often to the point of becoming physically sick to his stomach. At the onset of our last storm, I gave him a few drops of the hemp oil. Within 5 minutes he was much calmer. He still was nervous and shivered a little, but not nearly like he has always done in the past. The calming effects lasted for several hours and he was acting normal when the storm ended. No illness. No side effects. Very impressed with how well this product worked for my high anxiety dog
customer_reviews.author: teachusfour

customer_reviews.title: Helps with pain and discomfort
customer_reviews.text: This helped my older cat a lot with her arthritis pain. She has been able to walk more comfortably and get around much better. Makes me happy!!
customer_reviews.author: eileen callahan

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Noticed a difference in my 13yr old Aussie after 1 day. He was running around like a puppy. He seemed to enjoy the taste too.
customer_reviews.author: Miles Eaton

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: This product has helped our fur-baby so much. He is no longer as anxious and does not freak out at noises he doesn't know.
customer_reviews.author: BPaulich

customer_reviews.title: False advertising
customer_reviews.text: The product is being described as full spectrum hemp extract on here, however when arrived the ingredients clearly state HEMP SEED OIL. Not impressed.
customer_reviews.author: CelestialFlesh

customer_reviews.title: Stay away from this product & company
customer_reviews.text: This product is misleading and the company runs a scam to get good feedback by offering a free bottle if you send them a picture of the good feedback you submit. I gave it to my dog and haven't seen any improvement. I didn't want 100% hemp seed oil which it turns out it is. Total waste.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No dramatic difference
customer_reviews.text: Been using occasionally for awhile now and so far no dramatic difference on my 65# 4y/o dog’s anxiety/energy level, only mild if any. For large triggers, she still gets anxious despite 20 droplets. My dog still licks her joints/legs but not as much (hard to tell if it improved her pain as my dog doesnt have major joint problems). Will keep trying but i’m not sure this is worth the increase in price (was $15 when i bought it).
customer_reviews.author: S. Chang

customer_reviews.title: CBD for Doggie Dementia!!!
customer_reviews.text: We recently adopted our hospice foster, Jack. Jack is a 15 yr old rottie with bad hips, partial blindness and doggie dementia. This product allows Jack and I the ability to sleep at night. He is no longer roaming the house at night barking and panting, as is common symptoms of doggie dementia. He is running up and down the stairs like a wild man and has even started playing!! This cbd oil has helped both physically and emotionally! For both of us!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stay away!
customer_reviews.text: This product states five drops twice per day for pets under 20#. My cats 8 and 13# are throwing up just 2 to 3 drops once per day.
customer_reviews.author: Boiling Springs, SC

customer_reviews.title: I think that my dog is beyond hope
customer_reviews.text: I have used this for over a week now and I don't see any difference. She weighs 55 lbs so I started with 1 dropper full. after a few days I tried 2 droppers full. She likes it and I can just squirt it into her mouth. But she is not any calmer. I will keep trying.
customer_reviews.author: Lyon

customer_reviews.title: Full Spectrum Hemp Oil has given my precious Kisses her quality of life back
customer_reviews.text: My 14 year old Pom Kisses has tracheal collapse and a rough time breathing, she would have breathing fits with any slight excitement. Full Spectrum Hemp Oil has helped my sweet baby immensely. She now remains much calmer throughout the day, and doesn't get the anxiety that would cause her labored breathing. I'm happy I found the Full Spectrum Hemp Oil product for my precious Kisses, it's made tremendous improvement to my sweetie pies life ♡♡
customer_reviews.author: LuluBelle

customer_reviews.title: My 18 year-old Cornish Rex cat approves
customer_reviews.text: My old boy had been walking me up in the middle of the night for weeks on end, crying (in what I could only assume as pain). He has a congenital heart disease, asthma (with his own little cat inhaler) and has been on prednisone for a while. I had purchased a 500 mg hemp oil before I changed to this brand, but this one has made the most difference in his demeanor. I space the 10 drops throughout the 16 hours and he’s almost stopped crying at 3:00 am. I’m trying to adjust the dosage to accommodate his discomfort. It seems to work better than the other brand, and is a better price.
customer_reviews.author: Faux Librarian

customer_reviews.title: Our old dog thanks you!
customer_reviews.text: Our 13 yr old English Setter has an arthritic leg and was really slowing down overall, even with pain killers. Some days he was on three legs due to the pain and his appetite was decreasing, which was concerning. After four weeks of adding this hemp oil to his food, he has dramatically improved. We’ve cut his pain meds way back and he limps much less. I was skeptical of hemp oil, but I’m a believer now as it was the only variable that we changed. In addition to his improved stride, he has much more energy and playfulness and he is gobbling his food like he used to. This is an old dog that clearly feels better!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Why is it not for human consumption?
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t even open the product and am ready to send back. What I don’t like is that it says not for human consumption which makes me wonder about this product and if I should even give to my dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dog doesn't like it, it doesn't work, upset dogs tummy
customer_reviews.text: Not only did this do nothing for my dog, but she didnt like the taste. Even INSIDE of a hot dog or pill pocket she wouldn't eat it. I had to put the oil in her mouth which doesn't help to keep her calm either. Oh and after I gave this to her she had diarrhea. In the house. Each time. Which did not help keep me calm. Buyer beware. I would've been better of ripping up my money and feeding it to the dog.
customer_reviews.author: Leaislala

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I had really high hopes for this oil, but it missed the mark. First, I ordered 300mg, but received 1000mg. I started with a lower dose than was recommended for my 12y/o Jack Russell. I didnt notice much effect so moved her up an extra drop(started at 3) every couple days. We got up to 5 drops and she started to act crazy and grumpier than when she was not taking it at all. I stopped giving it to her. Overall disappointed, I was hoping to be able to take her off Carprofen/Tramadol or at least be able to minimize the amount that she needs. Oh Well.
customer_reviews.author: Chintastic

customer_reviews.title: Great for separation anxiety!
customer_reviews.text: This works for separation anxiety! I’ve tried just about everything to ease my dog’s separation anxiety. Nothing really worked until this! Now, she’s much more relaxed when I leave! She focuses on her chew treats instead of me leaving! I have a very picky dog so I fully expected to have to force drop it into her mouth. Turns out, she will lick it off my hand! I will buy again and again!
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: 3 weeks with no benefits yet...
customer_reviews.text: I've been using for about 3 weeks. So far no difference in my dogs' behaviors. I have one dog who had occasional seizures and another dog who is getting older and has hip issues with trouble walking on our hardwood floors. I add the oil directly to their dry food and they don't seem to notice it; no trouble with them eating it. No adverse effects in the dogs, but no benefits yet either. I'll continue to use for a few more weeks to see if there are any beneficial effects.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: great product at an excellent price
customer_reviews.text: I am a rescuer and have to deal with inflammation on one or two pets, anxiety on three. this is a great strength as it is very effective. I have purchased high-end hemp oil and not achieved the best results. the 1500 mg is a good strength to start seeing immediate results within a day for inflammation, and anxiety response depends on pet and refining the dosage but good. I have gone back and ordered four more bottles. hats off to the vendor who is making this product.
customer_reviews.author: reader

customer_reviews.title: NOT CBD!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to provide my pet with a CBD product and searched for such on Amazon. No CBD products are sold on Amazon, only hemp products such as this one. But, neither Amazon or this seller made that clear. They baited and switched. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: twogrnthmbs

customer_reviews.title: Will continue to buy for my fur kids.
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed with this product, I have seniors dogs, 1 that has seizures, one with joint issues and 1 with anxiety. This hemp oil has helped in so many ways. Lucy is my dog with seizures, which she just had one this afternoon. Usually they are very rough on her with a lot of thrashing around. Tonight I gave her the oil in during her seizure and while it didn't stop it there was a lot less thrashing and it didn't last nearly as long. I am very very pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work on any of my 3 cats.
customer_reviews.text: After having a baby my cats have become extremely anxious. Many people suggested CBD oil. After trying this product for over 2 weeks, giving it to them in their food twice a day. I do not notice any difference in any of my cats. They are just as anxious and acting out just as much, zero change in their behavior. I might as well be putting drops of water in their food. Disappointing to say the least especially because of how expensive a little vial is.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Snopkowski

customer_reviews.title: So excited about this product!
customer_reviews.text: I had planned on just adding it to my dog's food to mask the taste but when it arrived it was not meal time and she had just had a bad afternoon with me being gone several hours (howling and crying, wouldn't eat or drink, etc. and was overly hyper to see me to the point she was doing the reverse hiccup thing shih tzu's sometimes do when stressed) so I put 5 drops on a plate and she lapped it right up. Calm and peaceful at the moment. Looking forward to keeping her calm when we have to leave again! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: momof3819

customer_reviews.title: Anxiety Relieved...For us, Petparents, and our Dog!
customer_reviews.text: Our Border Collie mix developed and was suffering from separation anxiety. So bad, she scratched a hole in our sheetrock by the back door. Our Vet prescribed a low dose common sedative, but we noticed she was really off her game on it, so we stopped it. Heard from a friend about Hemp Oil; thought we'd give it a try. It has worked wonders! She's her old (young) self again. This is our second purchase of this product. Specifically: because it's made in the USA, the dosing is "up front", and IT WORKS! Thanks PB Pets!! (Oh.. and the wall has been patched is also looking good again!)
customer_reviews.author: GETOUT&WALK

customer_reviews.title: Ordered 2 bottles and one had a very cloudy liquid with floating debris.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 of these for my dog and noticed a marked improvement in her hip ailment. The first bottle contained a clear greenish liquid. However I just opened the sealed 2nd bottle and it has a very cloudy look to the liquid with floating debris. It’s passed my return date. Not very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Blanca Baldwin

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful to my pets.
customer_reviews.text: My husky has had issues with anxiety and arthritis in his hips, since I started him on the hemp products he has improved dramatically. He was a rescue and didnt like being around people, but has opened up since he has been on this. He is not as timid around them and will actually allow people to pet him now without trying to hide behind me. I can't stress enough that this is a natural and helpful product, and am hopeful that it helps with my other pups noise anxiety around the 4th of July.
customer_reviews.author: Orin

customer_reviews.title: I was skeptical...
customer_reviews.text: Yes, I was skeptical, and after I ordered, I realized this was Hemp oil and not CBD. But my "big" dog has hip dysplasia and I really mthink this helps her. Ironically, after my order arrived my "little" dog had (yet another stroke/seizure). Little Romeo is upwards of 17 years old, and not even hesitating, I gave little man 5 drops after his stroke, and it totally calmed him down. I probably needed it myself after this whole event!! Price is right, product works (in my opinion) and yes, I will continue giving it to BOTH dogs!! Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my elderly cat's anxiety. She was over-grooming to the point of harming herself. Within a couple of days of adding to her wet food she was noticeably calmer, and acting less nervous and fearful. It has definitely improved her quality of life with no side effects.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Duncan

customer_reviews.title: I saw results in my dog
customer_reviews.text: Can't comment on flavor? I saw a decrease in the amount of seizures my 10 year old yorkie was having as well as a decrease in the severity and longevity of the seizures. This is not a cure, but it seems to help and that's all i can ask for given putting her on medication could damage her liver. She is only five pounds and does not do well with taking pills. Administering the oil directly on her gums or just using the dropper in her mouth is so much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Calms our dog
customer_reviews.text: We have a senior female Lhasa Apso who can be very anxious. She will scratch herself raw, or pace the floor. The day I received this product I gave her a dose (in a treat) that evening. She was noticeably calmer the whole night! I gave her another dose 12 hours later, and she is a different dog! She also has atopic dermatitis, I am hopeful the hemp oil will help her with this as well. It sure would be cheaper than what I am paying for medication from the vet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Helps for anxiety and pain
customer_reviews.text: Our dog has anxiety as well as pain in her front leg. She also has a heart condition and is on meds. Rather than to give her other meds for pain we started to give her CBD oil. We take it so why shouldn't she. Seems to be working just fine. She is limping less and her anxiety has reduced also. She has only used one bottle so far. We mix it with her food and she is a picky eater but she is liking the taste.
customer_reviews.author: MichPark

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product, this is a must in my house. I have two cats that I use this product everyday, for as they start aging their arthritis is getting harder for them to do what they did when they were younger. Now with them using this product everyday, I see them jumping and playing like they did when they were 5, they don't act like they are 11.... Would recommend this product to anyone that has an animal that has signs of arthritis....
customer_reviews.author: Mary Keating

customer_reviews.title: New loyal customer!
customer_reviews.text: Our pets have been using the Hemp oil for a little over a week now and absolutely love it. They eveb enjoy the flavor so much that i dont have to mask it with a treat. It seems to have helped my older pup’s mood and diet, he seems more active with increased mobility and my 2year old hyper cattle dog has lost some of her anxiety around guests! this product is fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony A.

customer_reviews.title: Seems to calm my cat
customer_reviews.text: My cat is 16 years old (80 years people old) and has anxiety and goes around the house screaming. I had him check out by the vet and he is not in pain and in good health. The vet believes that the cat has anxiety and while she could not recommend a non-prescription she said that she would use it on her pets and some of her clients have used similar products with success on their pets. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: gmcajun

customer_reviews.title: Great Product.  I will be ordering this again for our dog Trigo
customer_reviews.text: I had tried a couple of the ones listed with good reviews. I was disappointed to find out the one we purchased was no longer available. I did some searching and found this product. Our dog loves it and eats his food without issue. His joint paint seems to be doing better and he seems like he has more energy. He is 13 years old (Soft Coated Wheaten Terrier) No one believe us when they see him and we tell them how old Trigo is. I will be buying this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Rico

customer_reviews.title: Better than prescription meds
customer_reviews.text: Used for geriatric cat and a rescue dog with separation anxiety, I noticed results after 7-10 days. Calmer disposition for the dog and the cat stopped barfing up food. I'm trying to comfort them and this really seems to help! Vets will not recommend hemp. Cold pressed is best.
customer_reviews.author: Girly Gurl

customer_reviews.title: ~be gentle...but definitely worth trying~
customer_reviews.text: ~this is an outstanding product...I think... My hesitancy comes from the particulars perfect for my pup. When I gave her more than one drop she, unfortunately threw up. However, with just one small drop she did appear more relaxed. It seems strange that it would be that strong...IE: the jury is still out. But the company is amazing: responsive, kind and professional! It’s worth giving it a try...just be gentle!~
customer_reviews.author: Sparkles

customer_reviews.title: Superior taste
customer_reviews.text: I give hemp oil to my cat to relieve her dry, itchy skin and prevent her from ripping hair out until she's bald. @_@ My cat actually prefers these drops over others we have tried. I don't even have to mix it into the food to mask it anymore. The oil has a bit of a thicker viscosity than others too. If the cat's happy, I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: LlamaKid Barrith

customer_reviews.title: Great oil hemp oil
customer_reviews.text: My fur baby had a lot of seasonal allergies so I tried this oil hoping it would help. Was amazed of how well it’s worked, within 5 days he was no longer scratching constantly and within a week in a half he was back to normal. I have recommended this product to a co-worker and neighbor who also purchased this product. Definitely would recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Ruth

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: My cat has anxiety and barely lets anyone pick her up besides us. She also hates being groomed and often panics when being groomed. (She was a rescue) With this product, she sits on laps and purrs as we groom her. YAY!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Chaffin

customer_reviews.title: Happy I found this!!!
customer_reviews.text: I use it on my fur baby for separation anxiety. It seems to have helped a lot. He doesn’t howl hours when I’m gone now and seems to just be more calm and comfortable. Makes me feel a lot better when I have to leave him to know he is calm and relaxing.. and yes I know because I set up a camera to check on him throughout the day. 🤣 I will continue to use this product!!
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: Received quickly
customer_reviews.text: Received product quickly. Started my 12 yr old dog on it this week. I'm very hopeful it will help her arthritis in her back legs. She seems pretty good so far she's jumped on the couch a few times which is a great sign.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: This Hemp Oil is Organic and really Priced Right!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product for two cats who have asthma. Hemp Oil is supposed to reduce inflammation and I have used other brands which seem to work. PB Pets is organic and priced well below many of the other brands and this is why I chose PB Pets. I will purchase it again. Cody Horton/Author/Consciously Creating Wealth
customer_reviews.author: Higher Self Workshops (Consignment)

customer_reviews.title: Pain relief for my pet dog, Tyson
customer_reviews.text: Our dog, Tyson seemed to be experiencing some joint problems when we went for our walks, possibly arthritis? My sister suggested hemp oil, as she tried it on her pets with great success. It's only been a few days, but I've not noticed any more limping or signs of discomfort. Seems to be working well! Thank you! Chris
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Very thankful
customer_reviews.text: I had a small dog that had some strained muscle issues and an old dog with bad crunch hips. I put both dogs on this and after 3 days of twice a day doses they are feeling so much better. This product is top notch and I will be buying g another bottle in about three weeks because I am never going to be without this ever again. Thank you so much. I've advised people to buy this product and they have seen wonderful progress in thier animals. Best product on the market.
customer_reviews.author: angela Flores

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work for everything!
customer_reviews.text: We haven't noticed any difference in our 80lb dog. We've been giving him a dropper and half twice a day for the last week. Hes still anxious and hyper. Extremely disappointed in the product.
customer_reviews.author: amanda g

customer_reviews.title: very calming
customer_reviews.text: I have an adult pooch here that is from a puppy mill as the breeder mom. She was nervous as heck about being around a human and in a house, etc. This oil really helped calm her down enough for her to relax and enjoy and learn about being a loved dog. They send something saying they're going to give you a bottle free. They don't. Don't waste your time filling it out.
customer_reviews.author: Magoo

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Our 14 year old Jack Russell was having a hard time getting around due to arthritis despite being on medicines from our vet. I had heard so many good things about CBD oil that I decided to give it a try on him. It has helped him so much! He is getting about much easier and seems to genuinely feel better overall. I also like the fact that it is made in the USA and is organic.
customer_reviews.author: Lowej

customer_reviews.title: Changed the life of our chocolate lab!
customer_reviews.text: Our chocolate lab has been having difficulty with her back hips. It broke our hearts when she would struggle getting up from laying on the tile (she won’t lay on a blanket...). This oil has been amazing! She has more energy and doesn’t struggle. I know it’s not a cure, but I’m 100% certain it’s giving her a happier, healthier life. And she goes on more walks now too!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kyle C-Bman

customer_reviews.title: Helping with pain and appetite
customer_reviews.text: I have been giving this product to my 20 year old kitty to help with arthritis pain and decreased appetite. He is much more comfortable and is eating better too. In the beginning we tried a bacon flavored brand, but my cat didn't like the flavor (even though he loves and asks for real bacon). He is comfortable with the natural flavor of this product. This product has definitely improved his quality of life and I will give it to him daily for the rest of his life.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Eckhardt

customer_reviews.title: Joint pain soooo much better
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my older dog's joint pain. We walk through the woods and before starting the hemp oil our walks were getting shorter and shorter with recovery time needed. After a couple of days using less drops than suggested, he was noticeably better. He is much more playful even after a good long walk. He can now jump up on the bed with no pain.
customer_reviews.author: IPad user

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: We have been giving to our 10 yr old Boxer who has been having issues with back legs which has been so bad she had a hard time standing and after a couple of weeks she is able to get up and with a little help getting down the stairs she can go out in the yard by herself.
customer_reviews.author: denise stahl

customer_reviews.title: Great for my little one...
customer_reviews.text: I got this to see if it would help my little yorkie with her separation anxiety. She is under 5 pounds and they say dogs that small will shake a lot, so I was willing to try anything. I use one drop twice a day for her, and I think it's helping her, she doesn't seem to shake as much. She still gets a little nervous when I leave her, but I have a noticed that the shaking has been reduced.
customer_reviews.author: Tika Webb

customer_reviews.title: Bottle was only half filled.
customer_reviews.text: My dogs like the hemp oil and it seems to help them as far as pain and calming. The only problem is I opened one bottle out of the three I ordered and the bottle was less than half filled. Plus the rubber part of the dropper had a crack on it so the dropper doesn’t work. Hopefully the other two bottles are okay.
customer_reviews.author: Nani

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: I am not a proponent of hemp or CBD oil but I decided to try the hemp on my rat terrier for her separation anxiety and anxiety in general. She used to bark every time a leaf blew outside and rat terriers have very high soprano "voices" that could drive a fur mom to drink! This has calmed her down a lot and she seems much more relaxed. Hope this helps you.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gives the dogs some relief
customer_reviews.text: My 2 dogs are seniors, and like myself they have aches and pains! I believe this gives them relief and I know it helps them sleep better. My groomer even made a comment at the last haircut that they seemed much more relaxed. I know I will cont to use this for them until they cross the rainbow bridge..
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Quality "Hemp" oil at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.text: My cats seem to not fight as much and the one cat isn't as high strung. I'm late writing review by months, however this gave me the chance to really see a difference. Give it a try, it can't hurt and PB offers a money back guarantee if you don't have desired effects.
customer_reviews.author: Ted Reviewed it!

customer_reviews.title: Yummy and effective
customer_reviews.text: This oil was for storm anxiety and separation anxiety, and not for the same person. We all have our challenges. Terrier, Poppins took her drops and rested nicely through a loud storm Dachshund Leo licked his drops, his lips with a 'yum' attack and settled for a bit.
customer_reviews.author: jhmc

customer_reviews.title: Better at doggie day care
customer_reviews.text: It was suggested that we try some cbd oil for our dog. He was a little anxious at doggie day care- who knew, I thought he was super excited!?! This has made a nice difference! I was worried about him being too calm- not having his lovable personality. Not the case at all! Chill, happy dog!!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Cat anxiety
customer_reviews.text: I have a cat that is very skittish to the point she either hides or runs all the time. She is ok with people but growls at our other animals. We purchased this hemp oil to see if it would calm her before trying meds from the vet. After the second dose there was a tremendous difference. She started walking around the house and sitting out where others could see her. We will continue using this product. Thankfully we will not have to put her on meds now. I would very much recommend hemp oil.
customer_reviews.author: Jesseca Bee

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my dog to help with driving anxiety/separation anxiety while on vacation. My dog gets anxious during car rides and when she is left alone. This did not help at all.
customer_reviews.author: Megan E

customer_reviews.title: Allergies under control!
customer_reviews.text: My dog had horrible allergies....watery eyes, bald spots from severe scratching, miserable. Vet gave $60/ mos meds. Tried them for 4 mos, they did not work. Bought this hemp oil and within a few days, my dog was feeling so much better, hair on those big bald spots grew back. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonShopper

customer_reviews.title: It served some purpose just not what I hoped for
customer_reviews.text: I was really hoping this would help my dog with her anxiety with thunder and fireworks, I see no difference whatsoever. I do notice however a slight difference in her back . Her lower back tends to get tight and spasm and it definitely seems looser .
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Lapierre

customer_reviews.title: Not that effective
customer_reviews.text: As far as I observed it didn't do much as it's not CBD oil. I only tried it once since my sick cat passed away the next morning. She was very ill so probably unrelated.
customer_reviews.author: Killing Time

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I thought I was going to have to put my Mini-Schnauzer down but this has given him a new lease on life. Not a cure all but way better than drugs. He have very little control of his hind legs and could barely walk, now able to climb steps and actually want's to chase a ball.
customer_reviews.author: Boris Badenov

customer_reviews.title: Helping my dog’s anxiety with storms.
customer_reviews.text: I was worried my dogs wouldn’t like the taste of it, but they eat it right up! One of them has horrible anxiety and we’ve tried everything. Benadryl doesn’t even work anymore. We’ve gotten through almost a whole bottle and two of his biggest anxieties have begun to calm down—rain and car rides. Just the other night it was storming enough to wake me up and he was sleeping like a baby. We will definitely order again!
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: I recommend these drops if your dog has any type of pain.
customer_reviews.text: My dog is going on 11 and has very bad arthritis is his back knees and hemp makes it all better. I alternate between these drops and hemp treats and that’s all I give him. He runs up and down the stairs like he’s 3 and shows no signs of pain.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie

customer_reviews.title: will order again
customer_reviews.text: works ok, but not a well as hoped! It just seems to just take the edge off. I have 3 cats and was given a Pitt Bull. She's a happy dog, wants to go after the cats in the house all the time. I have to keep her on a lead or put in the kennel and I really don't like doing that, but to save the cats and the house, I have to. I have no idea what to do to calm her down around the cats. I wish that this worked a lot better than it does.
customer_reviews.author: Roni

customer_reviews.title: Helped when other brands didn't
customer_reviews.text: I tried another brand or two before trying this one, and I really do feel that this one worked better overall. I noticed a difference in my dogs anxiety (and NOTHING else has worked) so that alone made me happy. As a plus, it also seems to help with her arthritis (she's 16) which she takes other meds for. I would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Laurel

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: We've tried several brands. This is by far the best product for our Pekingese. It's tasty 😋.. he licks it up. And seems to actually relieve his pain and calms him down. We give exactly 1/4 dropped per instructions
customer_reviews.author: Marshy

customer_reviews.title: Cured my dogs anxiety!
customer_reviews.text: My dog had really bad anxiety. When I would go to work, he would panic and tear up the carpet by the door to try to get to me. When I started giving him CBD oil, this completely changed. Now he is totally relaxed when I leave for work, and when I return home, I typically find him sleeping on my bed. I used to use a different brand that required a larger dosage and cost 3 times as much. PB pets hemp oil yields the same results at a fraction of the cost. And the bottle will last longer being that smaller doses work. I’ll continue to purchase, as my dog is so so much happier!!
customer_reviews.author: LindsayGilliam

customer_reviews.title: I see noticeable changes
customer_reviews.text: We have started both our kitties off on a low dosage and I definitely notice changes in my more relaxed cat. He has become, well, even more relaxed than before. Lol. We have another cat that is very anxious and will be upping his dosage to 4 drops tonight to see if his behavior changes any. I think it’s still too early to tell and with too little of a dose.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica L. Riedel

customer_reviews.title: helped with anxiety
customer_reviews.text: my 80lb husky was having anxiety. he was not himself on a daily basis . i give a small amount with his food 2X pr/day after 3 days he is more energetic and in more of a relaxed mode. there are no side effects and he is not drugged. great product. i was hesitant to use it but it has changed our lives!
customer_reviews.author: Bunky

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: OMG, this stuff brought my senior dog (15) back from debilitating arthritis. He also doesn’t cough from esophagus issues he’s had for years. I went from making an appt to euthanize him because I couldn’t watch him suffer any longer to one last ditch effort; I heard about CBD oil and decided to try. All i can say is so glad I did because I HAVE MY DOG BACK! Happy mom
customer_reviews.author: Alxon Hawkes

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: My dog suffers from separation anxiety. Every time I would leave her she would cry, bark, destroy everything around her...I have tried EVERYTHING and nothing works....I started using this oil on her food everyday and she has since calmed immensely. When I leave she barely even notices. It’s literally the only thing that has worked.
customer_reviews.author: Eric L. Rugh

customer_reviews.title: Just got the product I have six dogs so I will try it. I just received it yesterday so I will see.
customer_reviews.text: I am a little disappointed that everything I read about this product, there wasn't one thing said about 4 animals only not for human consumption. But then when I got the bottle yesterday it did say that on there. With it saying everything was organically grown I would think that that wouldn't be the case. I do not want to give my dogs something that I can't use. There is an hemp oil out there right now that you can take and your animals can take. Of course it is a little bit more expensive, but I would rather go that route then giving them something that a human cannot use
customer_reviews.author: Chichi bean

customer_reviews.title: Works great for pain
customer_reviews.text: It works great. I have a 15 year old dog that has trouble walking and has a number of joint and spine ailments and it’s enables her to start moving around better. It’s really enabled her to have a better quality of life. She seems way more mobile and happier. I only wish they sold larger bottles.
customer_reviews.author: MAP

customer_reviews.title: Great product so far!
customer_reviews.text: Our main use is for anxiety and seizure relief for our Pug. Noticed a dramatic decrease in anxiety right from the start. Waiting to see it's affect on seizures. Package arrived undamaged, on time and looks of high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Mahalo.Oregon

customer_reviews.title: NOOO
customer_reviews.text: NO, made my dog sick!!!!! Will never give this again. Come on Amazon, you need to regulate this crap and false reviews!!!!! If it's not ok for human consumption, its definitely not ok for my dog!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Laughry

customer_reviews.title: Helps with Allergies
customer_reviews.text: My Persian cat has allergies. I don’t want to keep her on steroids so I looked for a natural solution. I found this product online and have been using it for a couple of weeks. My cat is not licking and scratching as much as before and she actually likes the taste of the product!

customer_reviews.title: pain releif
customer_reviews.text: i have a cocker spaniel who hurt her rear paw and does not want to put weight on the paw.i have been using this product instead of pain medicine from the vet. the I have been using this product for three days it looks as though she is getting pain relief and no inflammation is present
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Disabello

customer_reviews.title: Cant wait to see long term difference
customer_reviews.text: Got this to see if it would help my lab mix with hip dysplasia. We live in a 2story house and she has been showing signs that its hurting her to go up and down the stairs. I've given it to her for a little bit and she seems to not have as much pain.
customer_reviews.author: Momof3

customer_reviews.title: Terrific product
customer_reviews.text: Our 10 yr old retriever mix has horrible arthritis and is in constant pain but after starting dosing her with this oil she is much more active her pain is obviously diminished considerably she now plays with her sister often as they did when they were young it is great to watch them be themselves again, we like it so much we will be ordering more of the oil.
customer_reviews.author: kateryne figueroa

customer_reviews.title: Natural pain relief
customer_reviews.text: I love using cbd natural oil for my kitty. After just a few minutes you can see that he is out of the pain that he is in cause by arthritis in his back legs. If it wasn't for cbd oil my kitty would have to go on medicine that would shut his organs down in a matter of months. With this cbd oil I can have my kitty here with us longer and pain free.

customer_reviews.title: Worked for 1/3 of my dogs
customer_reviews.text: I have three dogs. I started using it on all three for various issues and ailments and after three weeks I'd only noticed an improvement for one of the dogs, so now he's still on it but the other two are off.

customer_reviews.title: Worked for my cat.
customer_reviews.text: My cat was having difficulty breathing and congested. Nothing I gave him helped. Started this hemp oil and I noticed a significant improvement. Disappointed I can’t get it anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Helps an older animal.
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be a relief factor over and above standard meds. Flavor? Well, the pooch says OK, but it ain't steak! Tried other remedies higher in price and dose, but this seems to work just fine.
customer_reviews.author: B. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: It really works!!
customer_reviews.text: This oil has really been a big help for my Fur Baby, She take her medicine without any issue. Last time she had an checkup the vet noticed that some of her levels had gone down!! Buy This Product, you won’t be disappointed!!
customer_reviews.author: Charita H.

customer_reviews.title: This product has helped our dog tremendously
customer_reviews.text: Our sweet dog has been suffering from seizures for 7 years. Since starting this CBD oil she has been seizure free!!! We are so glad to have added it as an adjunct to her seizure meds, which already include keppra and zimpat. With these 2 medicines our pup still had 4-7 breakthrough seizures a year. Now with CBD oil added to this combo we are at an average of 0-1 seizure a year. we have been using this product for 2 years
customer_reviews.author: KRG

customer_reviews.title: Great Product. My aussie loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this not really knowing what reaction my dog will have. MY pup has bad anxieties and separation issues. We gave him a few drops for breakfast and dinner, and he started showing great results. He is calm, relaxed and seems to have benefited greatly from using this CBD Oil. I highly recommend for your dog.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Happy cat/happy life
customer_reviews.text: Great product. My 21 year ‘old man’ cat gets little bouts of kitten now and then...ever since using this product. A lot less barf sessions after eating too. That’s something to celebrate.
customer_reviews.author: Rossalyn

customer_reviews.title: Simple help
customer_reviews.text: Works very well on my older Basset Hound. She has anxiety and like all Bassets can experience back issues. I put it on her food and it hasn't affected her desire to eat so the flavor must be OK. Will order again.
customer_reviews.author: Deholm

customer_reviews.title: It works.
customer_reviews.text: It helps my 11 year cat with lumbar disease. This and daily glucosamine have made it possible to reduce the prednisone greatly. I’m very thankful and definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Firelei

customer_reviews.title: Calmed my pug!
customer_reviews.text: I have a pug that licks the air constantly...she will do it for an hour straight. Vet has told me it is an anxiety issue. I tried the hemp oil and within 20 minutes of giving it to her, she had stopped and was just laying down next to me. Nothing I have tried before has ever worked! I am so happy I found this product.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: Put a few drops in my dogs food, his seizures don't last as long and his fur is really soft since we have been using this product.

customer_reviews.title: Happy cat!
customer_reviews.text: My cat is old and has been moving around slowly and showing general anxiety when I leave him. I have been giving him this oil for a few weeks now and he seems to have calmed down quite a bit!

customer_reviews.title: works great for our Charlie
customer_reviews.text: He has Cushings and we have already reduced daily dosage for 2 pills to one pill. Moving around and getting up much easier now. Lots of pep! I can't personally speak for the taste but he seems to enjoy it :)
